<!-- Mark with an `x` all that apply -->

- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition/update
- [ ] Build/CI/CD update

## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an `x` -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] No console.log statements in production code
- [ ] No TypeScript errors (`bun run typecheck` passes)
- [ ] No linting errors (`bun run lint` passes)

### Functionality

- [ ] My changes don't break existing functionality
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally
- [ ] Build succeeds (`bun run build`)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated CLAUDE.md (if architecture changed)
- [ ] I have updated user documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated the changelog (if user-facing change)
- [ ] I have updated the feature spec status (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for public APIs

### UI/UX (if applicable)

- [ ] Changes are responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Dark mode works correctly
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader compatible (basic check)
- [ ] No accessibility regressions

### Git

- [ ] My branch is up-to-date with main
- [ ] Commits follow conventional commits format
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] No merge conflicts

## Post-Merge Tasks

<!-- Tasks to complete after merging -->

- [ ] Update feature status in `.docs/features/`
- [ ] Move to completed.md (if feature complete)
- [ ] Update changelog
- [ ] Close related issues
- [ ] Announce in discussions (if significant)

**Reviewers**: Please check against `.docs/workflows/code-review-checklist.md`
